statements: DELETE FROM geofencing_notifications WHERE notification_name = 'Welcome Notification';
DELETE FROM geofencing_notifications WHERE notification_name = 'Zone 1' AND notification_message = 'You have entered Zone 1';
DELETE FROM user_locations WHERE user_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM locations WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM locations WHERE name = 'Sample Location');
DELETE FROM users WHERE location IS NULL;
DELETE FROM user_locations WHERE location_id = 100 AND user_id = 50;
